title: 3rd Annual Anniversary Mass & Christmas Tree Lighting
desc: Join the Catholic Trojan Community for the THIRD Annual Anniversary Mass and Christmas Tree Lighting! This festive occasion marks the second year since the opening of Our Savior Church and USC Caruso Catholic Center.? Plan to join us for a special Sunday Mass followed by a Christmas Concert and the lighting of our Catholic Trojan Family Christmas Tree. A festive reception will follow the lighting of the tree. This is a family friendly event--plan to bring Catholic Trojans of all ages! All are welcome! CHURCH SEATING The Anniversary Mass & Tree Lighting is the most highly anticipated event of the year for the Catholic Trojan Family. While we will do our best to ensure a spot for everyone in the Church, this event is guaranteed to fill up. Overflow seating with a broadcast of Mass will be available in Newman Hall.  ? PARKING Parking will be available at Hebrew Union College (845 W. 32nd Street Los Angeles, CA 90007). While there is no charge for parking, we humbly accept donations of $5.? ? If you have any questions, please call our Events Team at 213-516-3965 or email events@catholictrojan.org. God Bless & Pray On!
